query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'messages' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user KrGaEuKwKPW5NAp.root --database mP6FLm6cHUyVdEMNViNuZS --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'messages' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	COLUMN_TYPE	IS_NULLABLE
id	int(11)	NO
bookingId	int(11)	NO
senderId	int(11)	NO
receiverId	int(11)	NO
messageText	text	NO
sentAt	timestamp	NO
readAt	timestamp	YES
